plot: A night out for Anna and her friends is all about scrap booking. One night, Anna has the nerve to suggest doing something else.
title: Scrap That
plot_es: A night out for Anna and her friends is all about scrap booking. One night, Anna has the nerve to suggest doing something else.
plot_en: A night out for Anna and her friends is all about scrap booking. One night, Anna has the nerve to suggest doing something else.
